hero.captureSpecialMoments: Capture your special moments with style

about.introductionText: we are a professional photographers with over 3 years of experience in capturing life's most precious moments. My passion lies in creating timeless images that tell compelling stories. Whether it's a wedding, corporate event, or personal portrait session, I bring creativity, technical expertise, and a keen eye for detail to every project.

services.title: MY PHOTOGRAPHY SERVICES
services.subtitle: Professional photography services tailored to capture your special moments with creativity and excellence

wedding.title: Wedding Photography
wedding.description: Capture your special day with timeless elegance. From engagement shoots to the big day, I document every precious moment.

portrait.title: Portrait Photography
portrait.description: Professional portraits that capture personality and emotion. Perfect for personal branding and family memories.

event.title: Event Photography
event.description: Dynamic event coverage for corporate functions, parties, and special occasions. Professional lighting and equipment.

commercial.title: Commercial Photography
commercial.description: High-quality product and business photography for marketing, advertising, and brand development.

landscape.title: Landscape Photography
landscape.description: Breathtaking landscape and nature photography. From urban cityscapes to serene natural settings.

food.title: Food Photography
food.description: Mouthwatering food photography for restaurants, chefs, and culinary businesses. Professional styling and lighting.

cta.readyToCapture: Ready to capture your special moments?

portfolio.title: EXPLORE MY PHOTOGRAPHY WORK
portfolio.subtitle: Discover my latest projects and creative endeavors across different photography styles

wedding-sarah-john.title: Sarah & John's Wedding
wedding-sarah-john.description: A beautiful outdoor wedding celebration filled with love, laughter, and unforgettable moments. Captured every detail from the intimate ceremony to the lively reception.

portrait-emma.title: Emma's Professional Portraits
portrait-emma.description: Professional headshots and personal branding photography for a successful entrepreneur. Clean, modern style that captures personality and professionalism.

commercial-restaurant.title: Nyandungu Restaurant
commercial-restaurant.description: Complete restaurant photography including interior shots, food styling, and team portraits. Created a comprehensive visual brand package for marketing materials.

event-tech-conference.title: Tech Innovation Summit 2024
event-tech-conference.description: Corporate event coverage including keynote speakers, networking sessions, and product demonstrations. Professional documentation of a major industry conference.

landscape-mountains.title: Rwanda Mountain Landscapes
landscape-mountains.description: Breathtaking landscape photography showcasing Rwanda's natural beauty. Captured during golden hour and blue hour for optimal lighting conditions.

food-artisan-cafe.title: Artisan Café Menu Photography
food-artisan-cafe.description: Styled food photography for a local café's new menu. Each dish carefully arranged and lit to showcase texture, color, and appetizing presentation.

gallery.title: PHOTO GALLERY
gallery.subtitle: Explore our latest photography work and creative projects
gallery.noPhotosText: We couldn't load the gallery photos at the moment.

services.question: What photography services do you offer?
services.answer: Portrait, wedding, event, commercial, food, and landscape photography with professional equipment and editing.

booking.question: How do I book a session?
booking.answer: Contact us via phone, email, or contact form. We'll discuss your needs and provide a customized quote.

process.question: What's your photography process?
process.answer: Consultation, planning, photo session, editing, and delivery. We work closely with you throughout.

equipment.question: What equipment do you use?
equipment.answer: Professional-grade cameras, lenses, and lighting equipment for highest quality results.

locations.question: Can you shoot at specific locations?
locations.answer: Yes, we work at studios, outdoor settings, or your preferred venue with location scouting included.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from our valued clients across different photography services. Discover why they chose us and how we helped capture their special moments.
testimonials.viewAllAndSubmit: View All Testimonials & Submit Your Own

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Ready to capture your special moments? Send us a message or contact us directly via WhatsApp
contact.tellUsAbout: Tell us about your project, event details, preferred style, budget, and any special requirements...
contact.whatsappText: Get instant quotes and quick responses. Perfect for urgent bookings or quick questions.
contact.emailText: Send detailed project requirements and get comprehensive proposals with pricing and packages.
contact.callText: Speak directly with our team for personalized consultation and immediate answers to your questions.

business.tip: 💡 Tip: For fastest response, use WhatsApp during business hours or email for detailed inquiries.

footer.description: Capturing life's most precious moments with creativity, passion, and professional excellence. Let's create timeless memories together.

chat.title: Teos AI Assistant
chat.welcome:

💡 Photography tips & advice

How can I help you today?
